碱基互补配对.en: complementary base pairing e.g. adenine A 腺嘌呤 pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA
碱基互补配对.pinyin: jian3 ji1 hu4 bu3 pei4 dui4

麦积山石窟.en: Mt Maiji Caves at Tianshui 天水, Gansu

麻花.en: fried dough twist (crisp snack food made by deep-frying plaited dough), worn out or worn smooth (of clothes)

黄鼬.en: Siberian weasel, Kolinsky weasel, Himalayan weasel

黑奴吁天录.en: Uncle Tom's Cabin, translated and adapted by Lin Shu 林紓|林纾

党徒.en: clique member, henchman, gang member, crony

龙南.en: Longnan county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州[Gan4 zhou1], Jiangxi

厐.en: variant of 龐|庞[pang2], huge, enormous

龛影.en: niche as shown in an X-Ray (medicine)
